text: Suggest a standalone python web framework?
I have a python program that I would like to present as a simple web application.
The program currently uses sqlite for storage.
I also need to distribute the whole thing to colleagues so having something standalone and easy to start would be ideal ( no install if possible).
This web app is meant to be used locally , not by multiple users over a network.
Is there a suitable python framework that might fit my needs?
I looked at Django so far but it seems a bit heavy handed for what I need.
